There are certain ad copy best practices that should be taken into account when writing your ads. Namely, you want to show value to a user without coming across as pushy.The best way to show value to a user is to think about their needs and benefits. Users respond to ads that include concepts that are important to them. Create 3 adcopy suggestions for the following text: """ The Best Choice in Home Furniture Stores

Find the best deals, customer service, and selection of brand-name furniture and appliances at Olum's locally owned and operated furniture stores. Binghamton, Syracuse, and Johnson City customers and residents of the surrounding areas often visit our convenient locations to browse our extensive inventory of affordable home furnishings, electronics, and appliances.

We have celebrated over 100 years of service, and we are proud to be among the area's premier furniture stores. Vestal, Syracuse, and Johnson City locals trust our dedicated staff for attentive help in selecting, financing, and delivering our fine products. We have all the furnishings you could need to turn a house into a home, from bedroom accessories to home entertainment features to dining room furniture and more. We also offer a huge selection of decorative accents to elevate your current home design.

When it comes to furniture stores, Binghamton, Syracuse, and Johnson City residents will tell you that working with an independent retailer like Olum's makes all the difference when it comes to pricing and individual customer attention. We take pride in exceeding our customers' expectations and look forward to helping customers transform any space. Check out our online inventory to see what we have to offer today. """
